title: Longwood up next for No. 6/5 Hokies - VT hokiesports.com
content: Longwood up next for No. 6/5 Hokies  VT hokiesports.com
description: FARMVILLE, Va. â€“ The No. 6/5 Hokies hit the road on Tuesday, making the trip to Farmville to take on the Longwood Lancers in midweek action. Tech is coming off an undefeated weekend, with its third ACC series sweep, this time against North Carolina.
